news.title: Crypto Daily Calls ThreeFold a Hidden Gem

news.content:
üóû ThreeFold in the News üóû


‚ÄúWith ThreeFold‚Äôs plans for 2022, we can expect major developments in the blockchain industry and beyond to happen on their infrastructure this year.


Just like Bitcoin is decentralizing global financial systems, ThreeFold will decentralize the Internet and cloud at large. With a solid team of cloud experts behind and many partners looking at building on top of their decentralized Internet with their mainnet launch, the moment to buy TFT is now.‚Äù


While The Market Is Struggling, This Hidden Gem Is About To Take Off, via Crypto Daily.


Full article here.


If you‚Äôre looking for ways to get TFT, look no further!

next.title: We're Tackling Internet Inequalities
next.excerpt: Let's break down Internet inequalities, together. Find out how ThreeFold is already collaborating to make this a reality!
